Okey 

As some of your knows NBW will go to change a little its story line,=
 and here's some ideas that Azure was working on. The plan is to keep ya up=
date and choose the best course of action in order to cheer ups this RPG an=
d upgrade it to next level. THis is one of several ideas that may appear an=
d all will be welcome to be heard. Also, it was suggested to change the nam=
e to Neo Beast War, New Age; but other titles will be considered too. 

Her=
e's what Azure has wrote.


-----------------------------------------------=
---------------------------------

Neo Beast Wars: New Age

 

Historical F=
acts

 

  After Unicron left the periphery of the system, he left several =
sleeping Minions on the moon. He had realized that the energon present on E=
arth was too powerful for him to absorb right away, and had decided to keep=
 a watchful eye on the planet until the crystals were ripe for his taking. =
With the Cybertronians out of his way, he went pleased with himself.

     =
       Yet before the Minions could awake, there came the wreckage of the M=
ephilis, a slaver ship. The crash on Earth caused the deaths of most of the=
 slave drivers, and those who survived were met with the wrathful vengeance=
 of the now free slaves. The slaves were from all known transformer faction=
s and builds, a few even dating back to the era of the Great Wars. They all=
 formed a loose society, agreeing that slavery was to be banned from their =
hearts, and punishable by death.

            Fifteen years passed, and the=
 Mephilis survivors were then joined by the crews of rescue ships that had =
finally managed to track them down. Contact was re-established with Cybertr=
on, and colons started arriving, forming high-tech cities that were designe=
d to ensure a central government on the planet. Industry and economy were b=
ustling, and everybody was happy.

            Or rather, they would have b=
een. The Minions awoke and soon, a sort of Cold War was raging between the =
Unicronians and the Cybertronians, but also between the Cybertronians thems=
elves. Old hatred died hard, and in this case, they even resurrected. The M=
aximals and Predacons emerged from the colonies and mistrust became rampant=
. Yet, some felt that it was their duties to make sure the Minions were bei=
ng watched. Some, no matter their personal allegiance, collaborated and for=
med the Watchers, keeping the Unicronians in check while others were embark=
ing on a power trip.

 Cities and Locations

  a.. Olympus Complex: The mil=
itary heart of the planet. Army training facilities are located there and m=
ost weaponry is available from that city. It is located inside a tall mount=
ain, with its higher rises coming out of the rocky top. Most military leade=
rs come from there, such as Lord Jotunn, leader of the Iron Skulls Predacon=
s. Minions are to be shot on sight in Olympus Complex.
  b.. Atlantis: Loca=
ted on an ancient island, this city is made up of tall towers and labs wher=
e science and knowledge reign supreme. It is the testing ground of experime=
ntal technologies. Pacificus Maximals are strong there, with Lord Perseus l=
eading them. Violence in Atlantis results in immediate banishment from the =
city.
  c.. Valley Mine Pentatron: As its name implies, this city is a mini=
ng city where much of the planet's workforce reside. It is also one of the =
most industrial cities in the world, and one of the most culturally univers=
al. At the same time, shady business is frequent and law enforcement is not=
 one of the priorities. Lord Spire, leader of the Bushido Predacons, holds =
her offices there.
  d.. Cryonosis: This is the Antarctic base of the Watch=
ers. It is loaded with up-to-the-minute stealth and surveillance technology=
. Not many dwell there, as it is the most environmentally hazardous city, b=
ut there are enough people to make Lord Elder, Watcher leader, proud of his=
 achievements. Giving in to faction struggles there can result in jailing.
=
  e.. Relay: If the world has a center, this is it. A city in the sky, Rela=
y is where the lords meet and vote, where the Central Government is seated =
and where the corporations are based. Trade is made from there, and transpo=
rtations and communications are developed there. Lord Razorwing, leader of =
the Silver Wings Maximals, is based there. Being found guilty of corruption=
 in Relay is punishable by public execution.
  f.. Orbital Factories: These=
 are the center of production for the planet.
  g.. Searing Eye Base: Rumor=
s say that the Minions are building a base on the moon, a tribute to Unicro=
n himself. Nothing is known for sure about it, but red reflections can be s=
een from the natural satellite at night.
 Factions and Groups
  a.. Bushido=
 Predacons: In the spirit of the warrior's way, these Predacons believe tha=
t preserving the peace will allow them to grow strong for the little while =
they still have before the Minions start an all-out war. Leader: Spire.
  b=
.. Iron Skulls Predacons: These Predacons think and proclaim loudly that th=
e Maximals are weak and that they will bring destruction on everybody when =
the Minions act. They would rather take over the lead from the Maximals and=
 act right now. Leader: Jotunn.
  c.. Pacificus Maximals: The Pacificus pre=
ach that peace is the only way everybody can focus on the efforts against t=
he Minions. Leader: Perseus.
  d.. Silver Wings Maximals: The Silver Wings =
are convinced that the Predacons are preparing a revolution and that they w=
ant to prepare a strike against them. They think they should take them all =
out before things get rough. Leader: Razorwing.
  e.. The Watchers: The Wat=
chers are dedicated to the monitoring of the Minions. They are crafty and s=
wift, and they are renowned Minion-killers at times. Their skills also incl=
ude diplomacy, however, as members of any factions can join the Watchers. L=
eader: Elder.
